name: PONY Index
description: $PONY, the Passive Omnichain Net Yield index, is a single, interest-bearing token designed to capture the best yields in DeFi and generate passive income. Free from impermanent loss, and managed by leading index methodologists (DeFi Pulse and Scalara), PONY delivers diversified exposure to high-quality stable coin yields from multiple vault providers across many blockchains.
